00050 /* we do nothing because we do not have refcount now */
00051 static void mdt_mfd_get(void *mfdp)
00052 {
00053 }
00054 
00055 static struct portals_handle_ops mfd_handle_ops = {
00056         .hop_addref = mdt_mfd_get,
00057         .hop_free   = NULL,
00058 };
00059 
00060 /* Create a new mdt_file_data struct, initialize it,
00061  * and insert it to global hash table */
00062 struct mdt_file_data *mdt_mfd_new(const struct mdt_export_data *med)
00063 {
00064         struct mdt_file_data *mfd;
00065         ENTRY;
00066 
00067         OBD_ALLOC_PTR(mfd);
00068         if (mfd != NULL) {
00069                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&mfd->mfd_handle.h_link);
00070                 mfd->mfd_handle.h_owner = med;
00071                 INIT_LIST_HEAD(&mfd->mfd_list);
00072                 class_handle_hash(&mfd->mfd_handle, &mfd_handle_ops);
00073         }
00074 
00075         RETURN(mfd);
00076 }
00077 
00078 /*
00079  * Find the mfd pointed to by handle in global hash table.
00080  * In case of replay the handle is obsoleted
00081  * but mfd can be found in mfd list by that handle.
00082  * Callers need to be holding med_open_lock.
00083  */
00084 struct mdt_file_data *mdt_handle2mfd(struct mdt_export_data *med,
00085                                      const struct lustre_handle *handle,
00086                                      bool is_replay_or_resent)
00087 {
00088         struct mdt_file_data   *mfd;
00089         ENTRY;
00090 
00091         LASSERT(handle != NULL);
00092         mfd = class_handle2object(handle->cookie, med);
00093         /* during dw/setattr replay the mfd can be found by old handle */
00094         if (mfd == NULL && is_replay_or_resent) {
00095                 list_for_each_entry(mfd, &med->med_open_head, mfd_list) {
00096                         if (mfd->mfd_old_handle.cookie == handle->cookie)
00097                                 RETURN(mfd);
00098                 }
00099                 mfd = NULL;
00100         }
00101 
00102         RETURN(mfd);
00103 }
00104 
00105 /* free mfd */
00106 void mdt_mfd_free(struct mdt_file_data *mfd)
00107 {
00108         LASSERT(list_empty(&mfd->mfd_list));
00109         OBD_FREE_RCU(mfd, sizeof *mfd, &mfd->mfd_handle);
00110 }
00111 
00112 static int mdt_create_data(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00113                            struct mdt_object *p, struct mdt_object *o)
00114 {
00115         struct md_op_spec     *spec = &info->mti_spec;
00116         struct md_attr        *ma   = &info->mti_attr;
00117         int                    rc   = 0;
00118         ENTRY;
00119 
00120         if (!md_should_create(spec->sp_cr_flags))
00121                 RETURN(0);
00122 
00123         ma->ma_need = MA_INODE | MA_LOV;
00124         ma->ma_valid = 0;
00125         mutex_lock(&o->mot_lov_mutex);
00126         if (!(o->mot_flags & MOF_LOV_CREATED)) {
00127                 rc = mdo_create_data(info->mti_env,
00128                                      p ? mdt_object_child(p) : NULL,
00129                                      mdt_object_child(o), spec, ma);
00130                 if (rc == 0)
00131                         rc = mdt_attr_get_complex(info, o, ma);
00132 
00133                 if (rc == 0 && ma->ma_valid & MA_LOV)
00134                         o->mot_flags |= MOF_LOV_CREATED;
00135         }
00136 
00137         mutex_unlock(&o->mot_lov_mutex);
00138         RETURN(rc);
00139 }
00140 
00141 int mdt_write_read(struct mdt_object *o)
00142 {
00143         int rc = 0;
00144         ENTRY;
00145         spin_lock(&o->mot_write_lock);
00146         rc = o->mot_write_count;
00147         spin_unlock(&o->mot_write_lock);
00148         RETURN(rc);
00149 }
00150 
00151 int mdt_write_get(struct mdt_object *o)
00152 {
00153         int rc = 0;
00154         ENTRY;
00155         spin_lock(&o->mot_write_lock);
00156         if (o->mot_write_count < 0)
00157                 rc = -ETXTBSY;
00158         else
00159                 o->mot_write_count++;
00160         spin_unlock(&o->mot_write_lock);
00161 
00162         RETURN(rc);
00163 }
00164 
00165 void mdt_write_put(struct mdt_object *o)
00166 {
00167         ENTRY;
00168         spin_lock(&o->mot_write_lock);
00169         o->mot_write_count--;
00170         spin_unlock(&o->mot_write_lock);
00171         EXIT;
00172 }
00173 
00174 static int mdt_write_deny(struct mdt_object *o)
00175 {
00176         int rc = 0;
00177         ENTRY;
00178         spin_lock(&o->mot_write_lock);
00179         if (o->mot_write_count > 0)
00180                 rc = -ETXTBSY;
00181         else
00182                 o->mot_write_count--;
00183         spin_unlock(&o->mot_write_lock);
00184         RETURN(rc);
00185 }
00186 
00187 static void mdt_write_allow(struct mdt_object *o)
00188 {
00189         ENTRY;
00190         spin_lock(&o->mot_write_lock);
00191         o->mot_write_count++;
00192         spin_unlock(&o->mot_write_lock);
00193         EXIT;
00194 }
00195 
00196 /* there can be no real transaction so prepare the fake one */
00197 static void mdt_empty_transno(struct mdt_thread_info *info, int rc)
00198 {
00199         struct mdt_device      *mdt = info->mti_mdt;
00200         struct ptlrpc_request  *req = mdt_info_req(info);
00201         struct tg_export_data  *ted;
00202         struct lsd_client_data *lcd;
00203 
00204         ENTRY;
00205         /* transaction has occurred already */
00206         if (lustre_msg_get_transno(req->rq_repmsg) != 0)
00207                 RETURN_EXIT;
00208 
00209         if (tgt_is_multimodrpcs_client(req->rq_export)) {
00210                 struct thandle         *th;
00211 
00212                 /* generate an empty transaction to get a transno
00213                  * and reply data */
00214                 th = dt_trans_create(info->mti_env, mdt->mdt_bottom);
00215                 if (!IS_ERR(th)) {
00216                         rc = dt_trans_start(info->mti_env, mdt->mdt_bottom, th);
00217                         dt_trans_stop(info->mti_env, mdt->mdt_bottom, th);
00218                 }
00219                 RETURN_EXIT;
00220         }
00221 
00222         spin_lock(&mdt->mdt_lut.lut_translock);
00223         if (rc != 0) {
00224                 if (info->mti_transno != 0) {
00225                         struct obd_export *exp = req->rq_export;
00226 
00227                         CERROR("%s: replay trans "LPU64" NID %s: rc = %d\n",
00228                                mdt_obd_name(mdt), info->mti_transno,
00229                                libcfs_nid2str(exp->exp_connection->c_peer.nid),
00230                                rc);
00231                         spin_unlock(&mdt->mdt_lut.lut_translock);
00232                         RETURN_EXIT;
00233                 }
00234         } else if (info->mti_transno == 0) {
00235                 info->mti_transno = ++mdt->mdt_lut.lut_last_transno;
00236         } else {
00237                 /* should be replay */
00238                 if (info->mti_transno > mdt->mdt_lut.lut_last_transno)
00239                         mdt->mdt_lut.lut_last_transno = info->mti_transno;
00240         }
00241         spin_unlock(&mdt->mdt_lut.lut_translock);
00242 
00243         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "transno = "LPU64", last_committed = "LPU64"\n",
00244                info->mti_transno,
00245                req->rq_export->exp_obd->obd_last_committed);
00246 
00247         req->rq_transno = info->mti_transno;
00248         lustre_msg_set_transno(req->rq_repmsg, info->mti_transno);
00249 
00250         /* update lcd in memory only for resent cases */
00251         ted = &req->rq_export->exp_target_data;
00252         LASSERT(ted);
00253         mutex_lock(&ted->ted_lcd_lock);
00254         lcd = ted->ted_lcd;
00255         if (info->mti_transno < lcd->lcd_last_transno &&
00256             info->mti_transno != 0) {
00257                 /* This should happen during replay. Do not update
00258                  * last rcvd info if replay req transno < last transno,
00259                  * otherwise the following resend(after replay) can not
00260                  * be checked correctly by xid */
00261                 mutex_unlock(&ted->ted_lcd_lock);
00262                 CDEBUG(D_HA, "%s: transno = "LPU64" < last_transno = "LPU64"\n",
00263                        mdt_obd_name(mdt), info->mti_transno,
00264                        lcd->lcd_last_transno);
00265                 RETURN_EXIT;
00266         }
00267 
00268         if (lustre_msg_get_opc(req->rq_reqmsg) == MDS_CLOSE) {
00269                 if (info->mti_transno != 0)
00270                         lcd->lcd_last_close_transno = info->mti_transno;
00271                 lcd->lcd_last_close_xid = req->rq_xid;
00272                 lcd->lcd_last_close_result = rc;
00273         } else {
00274                 /* VBR: save versions in last_rcvd for reconstruct. */
00275                 __u64 *pre_versions = lustre_msg_get_versions(req->rq_repmsg);
00276                 if (pre_versions) {
00277                         lcd->lcd_pre_versions[0] = pre_versions[0];
00278                         lcd->lcd_pre_versions[1] = pre_versions[1];
00279                         lcd->lcd_pre_versions[2] = pre_versions[2];
00280                         lcd->lcd_pre_versions[3] = pre_versions[3];
00281                 }
00282                 if (info->mti_transno != 0)
00283                         lcd->lcd_last_transno = info->mti_transno;
00284 
00285                 lcd->lcd_last_xid = req->rq_xid;
00286                 lcd->lcd_last_result = rc;
00287                 lcd->lcd_last_data = info->mti_opdata;
00288         }
00289         mutex_unlock(&ted->ted_lcd_lock);
00290 
00291         EXIT;
00292 }
00293 
00294 void mdt_mfd_set_mode(struct mdt_file_data *mfd, __u64 mode)
00295 {
00296         LASSERT(mfd != NULL);
00297 
00298         CDEBUG(D_HA, DFID " Change mfd mode "LPO64" -> "LPO64".\n",
00299                PFID(mdt_object_fid(mfd->mfd_object)), mfd->mfd_mode, mode);
00300 
00301         mfd->mfd_mode = mode;
00302 }
00303 
00307 static void mdt_prep_ma_buf_from_rep(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00308                                      struct mdt_object *obj,
00309                                      struct md_attr *ma)
00310 {
00311         LASSERT(ma->ma_lmv == NULL && ma->ma_lmm == NULL);
00312         if (S_ISDIR(obj->mot_header.loh_attr)) {
00313                 ma->ma_lmv = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill,
00314                                                     &RMF_MDT_MD);
00315                 ma->ma_lmv_size = req_capsule_get_size(info->mti_pill,
00316                                                        &RMF_MDT_MD,
00317                                                        RCL_SERVER);
00318                 if (ma->ma_lmv_size > 0)
00319                         ma->ma_need |= MA_LMV;
00320         } else {
00321                 ma->ma_lmm = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill,
00322                                                     &RMF_MDT_MD);
00323                 ma->ma_lmm_size = req_capsule_get_size(info->mti_pill,
00324                                                        &RMF_MDT_MD,
00325                                                        RCL_SERVER);
00326                 if (ma->ma_lmm_size > 0)
00327                         ma->ma_need |= MA_LOV;
00328         }
00329 }
00330 
00331 static int mdt_mfd_open(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct mdt_object *p,
00332                         struct mdt_object *o, __u64 flags, int created,
00333                         struct ldlm_reply *rep)
00334 {
00335         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = mdt_info_req(info);
00336         struct mdt_export_data  *med = &req->rq_export->exp_mdt_data;
00337         struct mdt_file_data    *mfd;
00338         struct md_attr          *ma  = &info->mti_attr;
00339         struct lu_attr          *la  = &ma->ma_attr;
00340         struct mdt_body         *repbody;
00341         int                      rc = 0, isdir, isreg;
00342         ENTRY;
00343 
00344         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00345 
00346         isreg = S_ISREG(la->la_mode);
00347         isdir = S_ISDIR(la->la_mode);
00348         if (isreg && !(ma->ma_valid & MA_LOV) && !(flags & MDS_OPEN_RELEASE)) {
00349                 /*
00350                  * No EA, check whether it is will set regEA and dirEA since in
00351                  * above attr get, these size might be zero, so reset it, to
00352                  * retrieve the MD after create obj.
00353                  */
00354                 ma->ma_lmm_size = req_capsule_get_size(info->mti_pill,
00355                                                        &RMF_MDT_MD,
00356                                                        RCL_SERVER);
00357                 /* in replay case, p == NULL */
00358                 rc = mdt_create_data(info, p, o);
00359                 if (rc)
00360                         RETURN(rc);
00361 
00362                 if (exp_connect_flags(req->rq_export) & OBD_CONNECT_DISP_STRIPE)
00363                         mdt_set_disposition(info, rep, DISP_OPEN_STRIPE);
00364         }
00365 
00366         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "after open, ma_valid bit = "LPX64" lmm_size = %d\n",
00367                ma->ma_valid, ma->ma_lmm_size);
00368 
00369         if (ma->ma_valid & MA_LOV) {
00370                 LASSERT(ma->ma_lmm_size != 0);
00371                 repbody->mbo_eadatasize = ma->ma_lmm_size;
00372                 if (isdir)
00373                         repbody->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLDIREA;
00374                 else
00375                         repbody->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLEASIZE;
00376         }
00377 
00378         if (ma->ma_valid & MA_LMV) {
00379                 LASSERT(ma->ma_lmv_size != 0);
00380                 repbody->mbo_eadatasize = ma->ma_lmv_size;
00381                 LASSERT(isdir);
00382                 repbody->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLDIREA | OBD_MD_MEA;
00383         }
00384 
00385         if (flags & FMODE_WRITE)
00386                 rc = mdt_write_get(o);
00387         else if (flags & MDS_FMODE_EXEC)
00388                 rc = mdt_write_deny(o);
00389 
00390         if (rc)
00391                 RETURN(rc);
00392 
00393         rc = mo_open(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(o),
00394                      created ? flags | MDS_OPEN_CREATED : flags);
00395         if (rc != 0) {
00396                 /* If we allow the client to chgrp (CFS_SETGRP_PERM), but the
00397                  * client does not know which suppgid should be sent to the MDS,
00398                  * or some other(s) changed the target file's GID after this RPC
00399                  * sent to the MDS with the suppgid as the original GID, then we
00400                  * give the client another chance to send the right suppgid. */
00401                 if (rc == -EACCES &&
00402                     allow_client_chgrp(info, lu_ucred(info->mti_env)))
00403                         mdt_set_disposition(info, rep, DISP_OPEN_DENY);
00404 
00405                 GOTO(err_out, rc);
00406         }
00407 
00408         mfd = mdt_mfd_new(med);
00409         if (mfd == NULL)
00410                 GOTO(err_out, rc = -ENOMEM);
00411 
00412         /*
00413          * Keep a reference on this object for this open, and is
00414          * released by mdt_mfd_close().
00415          */
00416         mdt_object_get(info->mti_env, o);
00417         mfd->mfd_object = o;
00418         mfd->mfd_xid = req->rq_xid;
00419 
00420         /*
00421          * @flags is always not zero. At least it should be FMODE_READ,
00422          * FMODE_WRITE or MDS_FMODE_EXEC.
00423          */
00424         LASSERT(flags != 0);
00425 
00426         /* Open handling. */
00427         mdt_mfd_set_mode(mfd, flags);
00428 
00429         atomic_inc(&o->mot_open_count);
00430         if (flags & MDS_OPEN_LEASE)
00431                 atomic_inc(&o->mot_lease_count);
00432 
00433         /* replay handle */
00434         if (req_is_replay(req)) {
00435                 struct mdt_file_data *old_mfd;
00436                 /* Check wheather old cookie already exist in
00437                  * the list, becasue when do recovery, client
00438                  * might be disconnected from server, and
00439                  * restart replay, so there maybe some orphan
00440                  * mfd here, we should remove them */
00441                 LASSERT(info->mti_rr.rr_handle != NULL);
00442                 spin_lock(&med->med_open_lock);
00443                 old_mfd = mdt_handle2mfd(med, info->mti_rr.rr_handle, true);
00444                 if (old_mfd != NULL) {
00445                         CDEBUG(D_HA, "delete orphan mfd = %p, fid = "DFID", "
00446                                "cookie = "LPX64"\n", mfd,
00447                                PFID(mdt_object_fid(mfd->mfd_object)),
00448                                info->mti_rr.rr_handle->cookie);
00449                         class_handle_unhash(&old_mfd->mfd_handle);
00450                         list_del_init(&old_mfd->mfd_list);
00451                         spin_unlock(&med->med_open_lock);
00452                         /* no attr update for that close */
00453                         la->la_valid = 0;
00454                         ma->ma_valid |= MA_FLAGS;
00455                         ma->ma_attr_flags |= MDS_RECOV_OPEN;
00456                         mdt_mfd_close(info, old_mfd);
00457                         ma->ma_attr_flags &= ~MDS_RECOV_OPEN;
00458                         ma->ma_valid &= ~MA_FLAGS;
00459                 } else {
00460                         spin_unlock(&med->med_open_lock);
00461                         CDEBUG(D_HA, "orphan mfd not found, fid = "DFID", "
00462                                "cookie = "LPX64"\n",
00463                                PFID(mdt_object_fid(mfd->mfd_object)),
00464                                info->mti_rr.rr_handle->cookie);
00465                 }
00466 
00467                 CDEBUG(D_HA, "Store old cookie "LPX64" in new mfd\n",
00468                        info->mti_rr.rr_handle->cookie);
00469 
00470                 mfd->mfd_old_handle.cookie = info->mti_rr.rr_handle->cookie;
00471         }
00472 
00473         repbody->mbo_handle.cookie = mfd->mfd_handle.h_cookie;
00474 
00475         if (req->rq_export->exp_disconnected) {
00476                 spin_lock(&med->med_open_lock);
00477                 class_handle_unhash(&mfd->mfd_handle);
00478                 list_del_init(&mfd->mfd_list);
00479                 spin_unlock(&med->med_open_lock);
00480                 mdt_mfd_close(info, mfd);
00481         } else {
00482                 spin_lock(&med->med_open_lock);
00483                 list_add(&mfd->mfd_list, &med->med_open_head);
00484                 spin_unlock(&med->med_open_lock);
00485         }
00486 
00487         mdt_empty_transno(info, rc);
00488 
00489         RETURN(rc);
00490 
00491 err_out:
00492         if (flags & FMODE_WRITE)
00493                 mdt_write_put(o);
00494         else if (flags & MDS_FMODE_EXEC)
00495                 mdt_write_allow(o);
00496 
00497         return rc;
00498 }
00499 
00500 static int mdt_finish_open(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00501                            struct mdt_object *p, struct mdt_object *o,
00502                            __u64 flags, int created, struct ldlm_reply *rep)
00503 {
00504         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = mdt_info_req(info);
00505         struct obd_export       *exp = req->rq_export;
00506         struct mdt_export_data  *med = &req->rq_export->exp_mdt_data;
00507         struct md_attr          *ma  = &info->mti_attr;
00508         struct lu_attr          *la  = &ma->ma_attr;
00509         struct mdt_file_data    *mfd;
00510         struct mdt_body         *repbody;
00511         int                      rc = 0;
00512         int                      isreg, isdir, islnk;
00513         struct list_head        *t;
00514         ENTRY;
00515 
00516         LASSERT(ma->ma_valid & MA_INODE);
00517 
00518         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00519 
00520         isreg = S_ISREG(la->la_mode);
00521         isdir = S_ISDIR(la->la_mode);
00522         islnk = S_ISLNK(la->la_mode);
00523         mdt_pack_attr2body(info, repbody, la, mdt_object_fid(o));
00524 
00525         /* LU-2275, simulate broken behaviour (esp. prevalent in
00526          * pre-2.4 servers where a very strange reply is sent on error
00527          * that looks like it was actually almost successful and a
00528          * failure at the same time.) */
00529         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_MDS_NEGATIVE_POSITIVE)) {
00530                 mdt_set_disposition(info, rep, DISP_OPEN_OPEN |
00531                                                DISP_LOOKUP_NEG |
00532                                                DISP_LOOKUP_POS);
00533 
00534                 if (flags & MDS_OPEN_LOCK)
00535                         mdt_set_disposition(info, rep, DISP_OPEN_LOCK);
00536 
00537                 RETURN(-ENOENT);
00538         }
00539 
00540         if (exp_connect_rmtclient(exp)) {
00541                 void *buf = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_ACL);
00542 
00543                 rc = mdt_pack_remote_perm(info, o, buf);
00544                 if (rc) {
00545                         repbody->mbo_valid &= ~OBD_MD_FLRMTPERM;
00546                         repbody->mbo_aclsize = 0;
00547                 } else {
00548                         repbody->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLRMTPERM;
00549                         repbody->mbo_aclsize = sizeof(struct mdt_remote_perm);
00550                 }
00551         }
00552 #ifdef CONFIG_FS_POSIX_ACL
00553         else if (exp_connect_flags(exp) & OBD_CONNECT_ACL)
00554                 rc = mdt_pack_acl2body(info, repbody, o,
00555                                        exp->exp_target_data.ted_nodemap);
00556 #endif
00557 
00558         /*
00559          * If we are following a symlink, don't open; and do not return open
00560          * handle for special nodes as client required.
00561          */
00562         if (islnk || (!isreg && !isdir &&
00563             (exp_connect_flags(req->rq_export) & OBD_CONNECT_NODEVOH))) {
00564                 lustre_msg_set_transno(req->rq_repmsg, 0);
00565                 RETURN(0);
00566         }
00567 
00568         /*
00569          * We need to return the existing object's fid back, so it is done here,
00570          * after preparing the reply.
00571          */
00572         if (!created && (flags & MDS_OPEN_EXCL) && (flags & MDS_OPEN_CREAT))
00573                 RETURN(-EEXIST);
00574 
00575         /* This can't be done earlier, we need to return reply body */
00576         if (isdir) {
00577                 if (flags & (MDS_OPEN_CREAT | FMODE_WRITE)) {
00578                         /* We are trying to create or write an existing dir. */
00579                         RETURN(-EISDIR);
00580                 }
00581         } else if (flags & MDS_OPEN_DIRECTORY)
00582                 RETURN(-ENOTDIR);
00583 
00584         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK_RESET(OBD_FAIL_MDS_OPEN_CREATE,
00585                                  OBD_FAIL_LDLM_REPLY | OBD_FAIL_ONCE)) {
00586                 RETURN(-EAGAIN);
00587         }
00588 
00589         mfd = NULL;
00590         if (lustre_msg_get_flags(req->rq_reqmsg) & MSG_RESENT) {
00591                 spin_lock(&med->med_open_lock);
00592                 list_for_each(t, &med->med_open_head) {
00593                         mfd = list_entry(t, struct mdt_file_data, mfd_list);
00594                         if (mfd->mfd_xid == req->rq_xid)
00595                                 break;
00596                         mfd = NULL;
00597                 }
00598                 spin_unlock(&med->med_open_lock);
00599 
00600                 if (mfd != NULL) {
00601                         repbody->mbo_handle.cookie = mfd->mfd_handle.h_cookie;
00602                         /* set repbody->ea_size for resent case */
00603                         if (ma->ma_valid & MA_LOV) {
00604                                 LASSERT(ma->ma_lmm_size != 0);
00605                                 repbody->mbo_eadatasize = ma->ma_lmm_size;
00606                                 if (isdir)
00607                                         repbody->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLDIREA;
00608                                 else
00609                                         repbody->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_FLEASIZE;
00610                         }
00611                         mdt_set_disposition(info, rep, DISP_OPEN_OPEN);
00612                         RETURN(0);
00613                 }
00614         }
00615 
00616         rc = mdt_mfd_open(info, p, o, flags, created, rep);
00617         if (!rc)
00618                 mdt_set_disposition(info, rep, DISP_OPEN_OPEN);
00619 
00620         RETURN(rc);
00621 }
00622 
00623 void mdt_reconstruct_open(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00624                           struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc)
00625 {
00626         const struct lu_env *env = info->mti_env;
00627         struct mdt_device       *mdt  = info->mti_mdt;
00628         struct req_capsule      *pill = info->mti_pill;
00629         struct ptlrpc_request   *req  = mdt_info_req(info);
00630         struct md_attr          *ma   = &info->mti_attr;
00631         struct mdt_reint_record *rr   = &info->mti_rr;
00632         __u64                   flags = info->mti_spec.sp_cr_flags;
00633         struct ldlm_reply       *ldlm_rep;
00634         struct mdt_object       *parent;
00635         struct mdt_object       *child;
00636         struct mdt_body         *repbody;
00637         int                      rc;
00638         __u64                    opdata;
00639         ENTRY;
00640 
00641         LASSERT(pill->rc_fmt == &RQF_LDLM_INTENT_OPEN);
00642         ldlm_rep = req_capsule_server_get(pill, &RMF_DLM_REP);
00643         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00644 
00645         ma->ma_need = MA_INODE | MA_HSM;
00646         ma->ma_valid = 0;
00647 
00648         opdata = mdt_req_from_lrd(req, info->mti_reply_data);
00649         mdt_set_disposition(info, ldlm_rep, opdata);
00650 
00651         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "This is reconstruct open: disp="LPX64", result=%d\n",
00652                ldlm_rep->lock_policy_res1, req->rq_status);
00653 
00654         if (mdt_get_disposition(ldlm_rep, DISP_OPEN_CREATE) &&
00655             req->rq_status != 0)
00656                 /* We did not create successfully, return error to client. */
00657                 GOTO(out, rc = req->rq_status);
00658 
00659         if (mdt_get_disposition(ldlm_rep, DISP_OPEN_CREATE)) {
00660                 struct obd_export *exp = req->rq_export;
00661                 /*
00662                  * We failed after creation, but we do not know in which step
00663                  * we failed. So try to check the child object.
00664                  */
00665                 parent = mdt_object_find(env, mdt, rr->rr_fid1);
00666                 if (IS_ERR(parent)) {
00667                         rc = PTR_ERR(parent);
00668                         LCONSOLE_WARN("Parent "DFID" lookup error %d."
00669                                       " Evicting client %s with export %s.\n",
00670                                       PFID(rr->rr_fid1), rc,
00671                                       obd_uuid2str(&exp->exp_client_uuid),
00672                                       obd_export_nid2str(exp));
00673                         mdt_export_evict(exp);
00674                         RETURN_EXIT;
00675                 }
00676 
00677                 child = mdt_object_find(env, mdt, rr->rr_fid2);
00678                 if (IS_ERR(child)) {
00679                         rc = PTR_ERR(child);
00680                         LCONSOLE_WARN("cannot lookup child "DFID": rc = %d; "
00681                                       "evicting client %s with export %s\n",
00682                                       PFID(rr->rr_fid2), rc,
00683                                       obd_uuid2str(&exp->exp_client_uuid),
00684                                       obd_export_nid2str(exp));
00685                         mdt_object_put(env, parent);
00686                         mdt_export_evict(exp);
00687                         RETURN_EXIT;
00688                 }
00689 
00690                 if (unlikely(mdt_object_remote(child))) {
00691                         /* the child object was created on remote server */
00692                         if (!mdt_is_dne_client(exp)) {
00693                                 /* Return -EIO for old client */
00694                                 mdt_object_put(env, parent);
00695                                 mdt_object_put(env, child);
00696                                 GOTO(out, rc = -EIO);
00697                         }
00698                         repbody->mbo_fid1 = *rr->rr_fid2;
00699                         repbody->mbo_valid |= (OBD_MD_FLID | OBD_MD_MDS);
00700                         rc = 0;
00701                 } else {
00702                         if (mdt_object_exists(child)) {
00703                                 mdt_prep_ma_buf_from_rep(info, child, ma);
00704                                 rc = mdt_attr_get_complex(info, child, ma);
00705                                 if (rc == 0)
00706                                         rc = mdt_finish_open(info, parent,
00707                                                              child, flags,
00708                                                              1, ldlm_rep);
00709                         } else {
00710                                 /* the child does not exist, we should do
00711                                  * regular open */
00712                                 mdt_object_put(env, parent);
00713                                 mdt_object_put(env, child);
00714                                 GOTO(regular_open, 0);
00715                         }
00716                 }
00717                 mdt_object_put(env, parent);
00718                 mdt_object_put(env, child);
00719                 GOTO(out, rc);
00720         } else {
00721 regular_open:
00722                 /* We did not try to create, so we are a pure open */
00723                 rc = mdt_reint_open(info, lhc);
00724         }
00725 
00726         EXIT;
00727 out:
00728         req->rq_status = rc;
00729         lustre_msg_set_status(req->rq_repmsg, req->rq_status);
00730         LASSERT(ergo(rc < 0, lustre_msg_get_transno(req->rq_repmsg) == 0));
00731 }
00732 
00733 static int mdt_open_by_fid(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct ldlm_reply *rep)
00734 {
00735         __u64                    flags = info->mti_spec.sp_cr_flags;
00736         struct mdt_reint_record *rr = &info->mti_rr;
00737         struct md_attr          *ma = &info->mti_attr;
00738         struct mdt_object       *o;
00739         int                      rc;
00740         ENTRY;
00741 
00742         o = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt, rr->rr_fid2);
00743         if (IS_ERR(o))
00744                 RETURN(rc = PTR_ERR(o));
00745 
00746         if (unlikely(mdt_object_remote(o))) {
00747                 /* the child object was created on remote server */
00748                 struct mdt_body *repbody;
00749 
00750                 mdt_set_disposition(info, rep, (DISP_IT_EXECD |
00751                                                 DISP_LOOKUP_EXECD |
00752                                                 DISP_LOOKUP_POS));
00753                 repbody = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
00754                 repbody->mbo_fid1 = *rr->rr_fid2;
00755                 repbody->mbo_valid |= (OBD_MD_FLID | OBD_MD_MDS);
00756                 rc = 0;
00757         } else {
00758                 if (mdt_object_exists(o)) {
00759                         mdt_set_disposition(info, rep, (DISP_IT_EXECD |
00760                                                         DISP_LOOKUP_EXECD |
00761                                                         DISP_LOOKUP_POS));
00762                         mdt_prep_ma_buf_from_rep(info, o, ma);
00763                         rc = mdt_attr_get_complex(info, o, ma);
00764                         if (rc == 0)
00765                                 rc = mdt_finish_open(info, NULL, o, flags, 0,
00766                                                      rep);
00767                 } else {
00768                         rc = -ENOENT;
00769                 }
00770         }
00771 
00772         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, o);
00773         RETURN(rc);
00774 }
00775 
00776 /* lock object for open */
00777 static int mdt_object_open_lock(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00778                                 struct mdt_object *obj,
00779                                 struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc,
00780                                 __u64 *ibits)
00781 {
00782         struct md_attr *ma = &info->mti_attr;
00783         __u64 open_flags = info->mti_spec.sp_cr_flags;
00784         enum ldlm_mode lm = LCK_CR;
00785         bool acq_lease = !!(open_flags & MDS_OPEN_LEASE);
00786         bool try_layout = false;
00787         bool create_layout = false;
00788         int rc = 0;
00789         ENTRY;
00790 
00791         *ibits = 0;
00792         mdt_lock_handle_init(lhc);
00793 
00794         if (req_is_replay(mdt_info_req(info)))
00795                 RETURN(0);
00796 
00797         if (S_ISREG(lu_object_attr(&obj->mot_obj))) {
00798                 if (ma->ma_need & MA_LOV && !(ma->ma_valid & MA_LOV) &&
00799                     md_should_create(open_flags))
00800                         create_layout = true;
00801                 if (exp_connect_layout(info->mti_exp) && !create_layout &&
00802                     ma->ma_need & MA_LOV)
00803                         try_layout = true;
00804         }
00805 
00806         if (acq_lease) {
00807                 /* lease open, acquire write mode of open sem */
00808                 down_write(&obj->mot_open_sem);
00809 
00810                 /* Lease exists and ask for new lease */
00811                 if (atomic_read(&obj->mot_lease_count) > 0) {
00812                         /* only exclusive open is supported, so lease
00813                          * are conflicted to each other */
00814                         GOTO(out, rc = -EBUSY);
00815                 }
00816 
00817                 /* Lease must be with open lock */
00818                 if (!(open_flags & MDS_OPEN_LOCK)) {
00819                         CERROR("Request lease for file:"DFID ", but open lock "
00820                                 "is missed, open_flags = "LPO64".\n",
00821                                 PFID(mdt_object_fid(obj)), open_flags);
00822                         GOTO(out, rc = -EPROTO);
00823                 }
00824 
00825                 /* XXX: only exclusive open is supported. */
00826                 lm = LCK_EX;
00827                 *ibits = MDS_INODELOCK_OPEN;
00828 
00829                 /* never grant LCK_EX layout lock to client */
00830                 try_layout = false;
00831         } else { /* normal open */
00832                 /* normal open holds read mode of open sem */
00833                 down_read(&obj->mot_open_sem);
00834 
00835                 if (open_flags & MDS_OPEN_LOCK) {
00836                         if (open_flags & FMODE_WRITE)
00837                                 lm = LCK_CW;
00838                         else if (open_flags & MDS_FMODE_EXEC)
00839                                 lm = LCK_PR;
00840                         else
00841                                 lm = LCK_CR;
00842 
00843                         *ibits = MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP | MDS_INODELOCK_OPEN;
00844                 } else if (atomic_read(&obj->mot_lease_count) > 0) {
00845                         if (open_flags & FMODE_WRITE)
00846                                 lm = LCK_CW;
00847                         else
00848                                 lm = LCK_CR;
00849 
00850                         /* revoke lease */
00851                         *ibits = MDS_INODELOCK_OPEN;
00852                         try_layout = false;
00853 
00854                         lhc = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_LOCAL];
00855                 }
00856                 CDEBUG(D_INODE, "normal open:"DFID" lease count: %d, lm: %d\n",
00857                         PFID(mdt_object_fid(obj)),
00858                         atomic_read(&obj->mot_open_count), lm);
00859         }
00860 
00861         mdt_lock_reg_init(lhc, lm);
00862 
00863         /* one problem to return layout lock on open is that it may result
00864          * in too many layout locks cached on the client side. */
00865         if (!OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_MDS_NO_LL_OPEN) && try_layout) {
00866                 /* return lookup lock to validate inode at the client side,
00867                  * this is pretty important otherwise mdt will return layout
00868                  * lock for each open.
00869                  * However this is a double-edged sword because changing
00870                  * permission will revoke huge # of LOOKUP locks. */
00871                 *ibits |= MDS_INODELOCK_LAYOUT | MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP;
00872                 if (!mdt_object_lock_try(info, obj, lhc, *ibits)) {
00873                         *ibits &= ~(MDS_INODELOCK_LAYOUT|MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP);
00874                         if (*ibits != 0)
00875                                 rc = mdt_object_lock(info, obj, lhc, *ibits);
00876                 }
00877         } else if (*ibits != 0) {
00878                 rc = mdt_object_lock(info, obj, lhc, *ibits);
00879         }
00880 
00881         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "Requested bits lock:"DFID ", ibits = "LPX64
00882                 ", open_flags = "LPO64", try_layout = %d, rc = %d\n",
00883                 PFID(mdt_object_fid(obj)), *ibits, open_flags, try_layout, rc);
00884 
00885         /* will change layout, revoke layout locks by enqueuing EX lock. */
00886         if (rc == 0 && create_layout) {
00887                 struct mdt_lock_handle *ll = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_LAYOUT];
00888 
00889                 CDEBUG(D_INODE, "Will create layout, get EX layout lock:"DFID
00890                         ", open_flags = "LPO64"\n",
00891                         PFID(mdt_object_fid(obj)), open_flags);
00892 
00893                 /* We cannot enqueue another lock for the same resource we
00894                  * already have a lock for, due to mechanics of waiting list
00895                  * iterating in ldlm, see LU-3601.
00896                  * As such we'll drop the open lock we just got above here,
00897                  * it's ok not to have this open lock as it's main purpose is to
00898                  * flush unused cached client open handles. */
00899                 if (lustre_handle_is_used(&lhc->mlh_reg_lh))
00900                         mdt_object_unlock(info, obj, lhc, 1);
00901 
00902                 LASSERT(!try_layout);
00903                 mdt_lock_handle_init(ll);
00904                 mdt_lock_reg_init(ll, LCK_EX);
00905                 rc = mdt_object_lock(info, obj, ll, MDS_INODELOCK_LAYOUT);
00906 
00907                 OBD_FAIL_TIMEOUT(OBD_FAIL_MDS_LL_BLOCK, 2);
00908         }
00909 
00910         /* Check if there is any other open handles after acquiring
00911          * open lock. At this point, caching open handles have been revoked
00912          * by open lock.
00913          * XXX: Now only exclusive open is supported. Need to check the
00914          * type of open for generic lease support. */
00915         if (rc == 0 && acq_lease) {
00916                 struct ptlrpc_request *req = mdt_info_req(info);
00917                 struct mdt_export_data *med = &req->rq_export->exp_mdt_data;
00918                 struct mdt_file_data *mfd;
00919                 bool is_replay_or_resent;
00920                 int open_count = 0;
00921 
00922                 /* For lease: application can open a file and then apply lease,
00923                  * @handle contains original open handle in that case.
00924                  * In recovery, open REQ will be replayed and the lease REQ may
00925                  * be resent that means the open handle is already stale, so we
00926                  * need to fix it up here by finding new handle. */
00927                 is_replay_or_resent = req_is_replay(req) ||
00928                         lustre_msg_get_flags(req->rq_reqmsg) & MSG_RESENT;
00929 
00930                 /* if the request is _not_ a replay request, rr_handle
00931                  * may be used to hold an openhandle which is issuing the
00932                  * lease request, so that this openhandle doesn't count. */
00933                 mfd = mdt_handle2mfd(med, info->mti_rr.rr_handle,
00934                                      is_replay_or_resent);
00935                 if (mfd != NULL)
00936                         ++open_count;
00937 
00938                 CDEBUG(D_INODE, "acq_lease "DFID": openers: %d, want: %d\n",
00939                         PFID(mdt_object_fid(obj)),
00940                         atomic_read(&obj->mot_open_count), open_count);
00941 
00942                 if (atomic_read(&obj->mot_open_count) > open_count)
00943                         GOTO(out, rc = -EBUSY);
00944         }
00945         GOTO(out, rc);
00946 
00947 out:
00948         RETURN(rc);
00949 }
00950 
00951 static void mdt_object_open_unlock(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
00952                                    struct mdt_object *obj,
00953                                    struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc,
00954                                    __u64 ibits, int rc)
00955 {
00956         __u64 open_flags = info->mti_spec.sp_cr_flags;
00957         struct mdt_lock_handle *ll = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_LOCAL];
00958         ENTRY;
00959 
00960         if (req_is_replay(mdt_info_req(info)))
00961                 RETURN_EXIT;
00962 
00963         /* Release local lock - the lock put in MDT_LH_LOCAL will never
00964          * return to client side. */
00965         if (lustre_handle_is_used(&ll->mlh_reg_lh))
00966                 mdt_object_unlock(info, obj, ll, 1);
00967 
00968         ll = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_LAYOUT];
00969         /* Release local layout lock, layout was created */
00970         if (lustre_handle_is_used(&ll->mlh_reg_lh)) {
00971                 LASSERT(!(ibits & MDS_INODELOCK_LAYOUT));
00972                 mdt_object_unlock(info, obj, ll, 1);
00973         }
00974 
00975         if (open_flags & MDS_OPEN_LEASE)
00976                 up_write(&obj->mot_open_sem);
00977         else
00978                 up_read(&obj->mot_open_sem);
00979 
00980         /* Cross-ref case, the lock should be returned to the client */
00981         if (ibits == 0 || rc == -MDT_EREMOTE_OPEN)
00982                 RETURN_EXIT;
00983 
00984         if (!(open_flags & MDS_OPEN_LOCK) && !(ibits & MDS_INODELOCK_LAYOUT)) {
00985                 /* for the open request, the lock will only return to client
00986                  * if open or layout lock is granted. */
00987                 rc = 1;
00988         }
00989 
00990         if (rc != 0 || !lustre_handle_is_used(&lhc->mlh_reg_lh)) {
00991                 struct ldlm_reply       *ldlm_rep;
00992 
00993                 ldlm_rep = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_DLM_REP);
00994                 mdt_clear_disposition(info, ldlm_rep, DISP_OPEN_LOCK);
00995                 if (lustre_handle_is_used(&lhc->mlh_reg_lh))
00996                         mdt_object_unlock(info, obj, lhc, 1);
00997         }
00998         RETURN_EXIT;
00999 }
01000 
01004 static bool mdt_hsm_release_allow(const struct md_attr *ma)
01005 {
01006         if (!(ma->ma_valid & MA_HSM))
01007                 return false;
01008 
01009         if (ma->ma_hsm.mh_flags & (HS_DIRTY|HS_NORELEASE|HS_LOST))
01010                 return false;
01011 
01012         if (!(ma->ma_hsm.mh_flags & HS_ARCHIVED))
01013                 return false;
01014 
01015         return true;
01016 }
01017 
01018 static int mdt_open_by_fid_lock(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
01019                                 struct ldlm_reply *rep,
01020                                 struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc)
01021 {
01022         const struct lu_env     *env   = info->mti_env;
01023         struct mdt_device       *mdt   = info->mti_mdt;
01024         __u64                    flags = info->mti_spec.sp_cr_flags;
01025         struct mdt_reint_record *rr    = &info->mti_rr;
01026         struct md_attr          *ma    = &info->mti_attr;
01027         struct mdt_object       *parent= NULL;
01028         struct mdt_object       *o;
01029         int                      rc;
01030         bool                     object_locked = false;
01031         __u64                    ibits = 0;
01032         ENTRY;
01033 
01034         if (md_should_create(flags) && !(flags & MDS_OPEN_HAS_EA)) {
01035                 if (!lu_fid_eq(rr->rr_fid1, rr->rr_fid2)) {
01036                         parent = mdt_object_find(env, mdt, rr->rr_fid1);
01037                         if (IS_ERR(parent)) {
01038                                 CDEBUG(D_INODE, "Fail to find parent "DFID
01039                                        " for anonymous created %ld, try to"
01040                                        " use server-side parent.\n",
01041                                        PFID(rr->rr_fid1), PTR_ERR(parent));
01042                                 parent = NULL;
01043                         }
01044                 }
01045                 if (parent == NULL)
01046                         ma->ma_need |= MA_PFID;
01047         }
01048 
01049         o = mdt_object_find(env, mdt, rr->rr_fid2);
01050         if (IS_ERR(o))
01051                 GOTO(out_parent_put, rc = PTR_ERR(o));
01052 
01053         if (mdt_object_remote(o)) {
01054                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "%s: "DFID" is on remote MDT.\n",
01055                        mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
01056                        PFID(rr->rr_fid2));
01057                 GOTO(out, rc = -EREMOTE);
01058         } else if (!mdt_object_exists(o)) {
01059                 mdt_set_disposition(info, rep,
01060                                     DISP_IT_EXECD |
01061                                     DISP_LOOKUP_EXECD |
01062                                     DISP_LOOKUP_NEG);
01063                 GOTO(out, rc = -ENOENT);
01064         }
01065 
01066         mdt_set_disposition(info, rep, (DISP_IT_EXECD | DISP_LOOKUP_EXECD));
01067 
01068         mdt_prep_ma_buf_from_rep(info, o, ma);
01069         if (flags & MDS_OPEN_RELEASE)
01070                 ma->ma_need |= MA_HSM;
01071         rc = mdt_attr_get_complex(info, o, ma);
01072         if (rc)
01073                 GOTO(out, rc);
01074 
01075         /* We should not change file's existing LOV EA */
01076         if (S_ISREG(lu_object_attr(&o->mot_obj)) &&
01077             flags & MDS_OPEN_HAS_EA && ma->ma_valid & MA_LOV)
01078                 GOTO(out, rc = -EEXIST);
01079 
01080         /* If a release request, check file flags are fine and ask for an
01081          * exclusive open access. */
01082         if (flags & MDS_OPEN_RELEASE && !mdt_hsm_release_allow(ma))
01083                 GOTO(out, rc = -EPERM);
01084 
01085         rc = mdt_check_resent_lock(info, o, lhc);
01086         if (rc < 0) {
01087                 GOTO(out, rc);
01088         } else if (rc > 0) {
01089                 rc = mdt_object_open_lock(info, o, lhc, &ibits);
01090                 object_locked = true;
01091                 if (rc)
01092                         GOTO(out_unlock, rc);
01093         }
01094 
01095         if (ma->ma_valid & MA_PFID) {
01096                 parent = mdt_object_find(env, mdt, &ma->ma_pfid);
01097                 if (IS_ERR(parent)) {
01098                         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "Fail to find parent "DFID
01099                                " for anonymous created %ld, try to"
01100                                " use system default.\n",
01101                                PFID(&ma->ma_pfid), PTR_ERR(parent));
01102                         parent = NULL;
01103                 }
01104         }
01105 
01106         rc = mdt_finish_open(info, parent, o, flags, 0, rep);
01107         if (!rc) {
01108                 mdt_set_disposition(info, rep, DISP_LOOKUP_POS);
01109                 if (flags & MDS_OPEN_LOCK)
01110                         mdt_set_disposition(info, rep, DISP_OPEN_LOCK);
01111                 if (flags & MDS_OPEN_LEASE)
01112                         mdt_set_disposition(info, rep, DISP_OPEN_LEASE);
01113         }
01114         GOTO(out_unlock, rc);
01115 
01116 out_unlock:
01117         if (object_locked)
01118                 mdt_object_open_unlock(info, o, lhc, ibits, rc);
01119 out:
01120         mdt_object_put(env, o);
01121 out_parent_put:
01122         if (parent != NULL)
01123                 mdt_object_put(env, parent);
01124         return rc;
01125 }
01126 
01127 /* Cross-ref request. Currently it can only be a pure open (w/o create) */
01128 static int mdt_cross_open(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
01129                           const struct lu_fid *parent_fid,
01130                           const struct lu_fid *fid,
01131                           struct ldlm_reply *rep, __u32 flags)
01132 {
01133         struct md_attr    *ma = &info->mti_attr;
01134         struct mdt_object *o;
01135         int                rc;
01136         ENTRY;
01137 
01138         o = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt, fid);
01139         if (IS_ERR(o))
01140                 RETURN(rc = PTR_ERR(o));
01141 
01142         if (mdt_object_remote(o)) {
01143                 /* Something is wrong here, the object is on another MDS! */
01144                 CERROR("%s: "DFID" isn't on this server!: rc = %d\n",
01145                        mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt), PFID(fid), -EFAULT);
01146                 LU_OBJECT_DEBUG(D_WARNING, info->mti_env,
01147                                 &o->mot_obj,
01148                                 "Object isn't on this server! FLD error?");
01149                 rc = -EFAULT;
01150         } else {
01151                 if (mdt_object_exists(o)) {
01152                         /* Do permission check for cross-open. */
01153                         rc = mo_permission(info->mti_env, NULL,
01154                                            mdt_object_child(o),
01155                                            NULL, flags | MDS_OPEN_CROSS);
01156                         if (rc)
01157                                 goto out;
01158 
01159                         mdt_prep_ma_buf_from_rep(info, o, ma);
01160                         rc = mdt_attr_get_complex(info, o, ma);
01161                         if (rc != 0)
01162                                 GOTO(out, rc);
01163 
01164                         rc = mdt_finish_open(info, NULL, o, flags, 0, rep);
01165                 } else {
01166                         /*
01167                          * Something is wrong here. lookup was positive but
01168                          * there is no object!
01169                          */
01170                         CERROR("%s: "DFID" doesn't exist!: rc = %d\n",
01171                               mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt), PFID(fid), -EFAULT);
01172                         rc = -EFAULT;
01173                 }
01174         }
01175 out:
01176         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, o);
01177         RETURN(rc);
01178 }
01179 
01180 int mdt_reint_open(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct mdt_lock_handle *lhc)
01181 {
01182         struct mdt_device       *mdt = info->mti_mdt;
01183         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = mdt_info_req(info);
01184         struct mdt_object       *parent;
01185         struct mdt_object       *child;
01186         struct mdt_lock_handle  *lh;
01187         struct ldlm_reply       *ldlm_rep;
01188         struct mdt_body         *repbody;
01189         struct lu_fid           *child_fid = &info->mti_tmp_fid1;
01190         struct md_attr          *ma = &info->mti_attr;
01191         __u64                    create_flags = info->mti_spec.sp_cr_flags;
01192         __u64                    ibits = 0;
01193         struct mdt_reint_record *rr = &info->mti_rr;
01194         int                      result, rc;
01195         int                      created = 0;
01196         int                      object_locked = 0;
01197         __u32                    msg_flags;
01198         ENTRY;
01199 
01200         OBD_FAIL_TIMEOUT_ORSET(OBD_FAIL_MDS_PAUSE_OPEN, OBD_FAIL_ONCE,
01201                                (obd_timeout + 1) / 4);
01202 
01203         mdt_counter_incr(req, LPROC_MDT_OPEN);
01204         repbody = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
01205 
01206         ma->ma_need = MA_INODE;
01207         ma->ma_valid = 0;
01208 
01209         LASSERT(info->mti_pill->rc_fmt == &RQF_LDLM_INTENT_OPEN);
01210         ldlm_rep = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_DLM_REP);
01211 
01212         if (unlikely(create_flags & MDS_OPEN_JOIN_FILE)) {
01213                 CERROR("file join is not supported anymore.\n");
01214                 GOTO(out, result = err_serious(-EOPNOTSUPP));
01215         }
01216         msg_flags = lustre_msg_get_flags(req->rq_reqmsg);
01217 
01218         if ((create_flags & (MDS_OPEN_HAS_EA | MDS_OPEN_HAS_OBJS)) &&
01219             info->mti_spec.u.sp_ea.eadata == NULL)
01220                 GOTO(out, result = err_serious(-EINVAL));
01221 
01222         if (create_flags & FMODE_WRITE &&
01223             exp_connect_flags(req->rq_export) & OBD_CONNECT_RDONLY)
01224                 GOTO(out, result = -EROFS);
01225 
01226         CDEBUG(D_INODE, "I am going to open "DFID"/("DNAME"->"DFID") "
01227                "cr_flag="LPO64" mode=0%06o msg_flag=0x%x\n",
01228                PFID(rr->rr_fid1), PNAME(&rr->rr_name),
01229                PFID(rr->rr_fid2), create_flags,
01230                ma->ma_attr.la_mode, msg_flags);
01231 
01232         if (info->mti_cross_ref) {
01233                 /* This is cross-ref open */
01234                 mdt_set_disposition(info, ldlm_rep,
01235                             (DISP_IT_EXECD | DISP_LOOKUP_EXECD |
01236                              DISP_LOOKUP_POS));
01237                 result = mdt_cross_open(info, rr->rr_fid2, rr->rr_fid1,
01238                                         ldlm_rep, create_flags);
01239                 GOTO(out, result);
01240         } else if (req_is_replay(req) ||
01241             (req->rq_export->exp_libclient && create_flags & MDS_OPEN_HAS_EA)) {
01242                 /* This is a replay request or from liblustre with ea. */
01243                 result = mdt_open_by_fid(info, ldlm_rep);
01244 
01245                 if (result != -ENOENT) {
01246                         if (req->rq_export->exp_libclient &&
01247                             create_flags & MDS_OPEN_HAS_EA)
01248                                 GOTO(out, result = 0);
01249                         GOTO(out, result);
01250                 }
01251                 /* We didn't find the correct object, so we need to re-create it
01252                  * via a regular replay. */
01253                 if (!(create_flags & MDS_OPEN_CREAT)) {
01254                         DEBUG_REQ(D_ERROR, req,
01255                                   "OPEN & CREAT not in open replay/by_fid.");
01256                         GOTO(out, result = -EFAULT);
01257                 }
01258                 CDEBUG(D_INFO, "No object(1), continue as regular open.\n");
01259         } else if (create_flags & (MDS_OPEN_BY_FID | MDS_OPEN_LOCK)) {
01260                 /*
01261                  * MDS_OPEN_LOCK is checked for backward compatibility with 2.1
01262                  * client.
01263                  */
01264                 result = mdt_open_by_fid_lock(info, ldlm_rep, lhc);
01265                 if (result < 0)
01266                         CDEBUG(D_INFO, "no object for "DFID": %d\n",
01267                                PFID(rr->rr_fid2), result);
01268                 GOTO(out, result);
01269         }
01270 
01271         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_MDS_OPEN_PACK))
01272                 GOTO(out, result = err_serious(-ENOMEM));
01273 
01274         mdt_set_disposition(info, ldlm_rep,
01275                             (DISP_IT_EXECD | DISP_LOOKUP_EXECD));
01276 
01277         if (!lu_name_is_valid(&rr->rr_name))
01278                 GOTO(out, result = -EPROTO);
01279 
01280 again:
01281         lh = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_PARENT];
01282         mdt_lock_pdo_init(lh,
01283                           (create_flags & MDS_OPEN_CREAT) ? LCK_PW : LCK_PR,
01284                           &rr->rr_name);
01285 
01286         parent = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, mdt, rr->rr_fid1);
01287         if (IS_ERR(parent))
01288                 GOTO(out, result = PTR_ERR(parent));
01289 
01290         result = mdt_object_lock(info, parent, lh, MDS_INODELOCK_UPDATE);
01291         if (result != 0) {
01292                 mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, parent);
01293                 GOTO(out, result);
01294         }
01295 
01296         /* get and check version of parent */
01297         result = mdt_version_get_check(info, parent, 0);
01298         if (result)
01299                 GOTO(out_parent, result);
01300 
01301         fid_zero(child_fid);
01302 
01303         result = mdo_lookup(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(parent),
01304                             &rr->rr_name, child_fid, &info->mti_spec);
01305 
01306         LASSERTF(ergo(result == 0, fid_is_sane(child_fid)),
01307                  "looking for "DFID"/"DNAME", found FID = "DFID"\n",
01308                  PFID(mdt_object_fid(parent)), PNAME(&rr->rr_name),
01309                  PFID(child_fid));
01310 
01311         if (result != 0 && result != -ENOENT && result != -ESTALE)
01312                 GOTO(out_parent, result);
01313 
01314         if (result == -ENOENT || result == -ESTALE) {
01315                 /* If the object is dead, let's check if the object
01316                  * is being migrated to a new object */
01317                 if (result == -ESTALE) {
01318                         struct lu_buf lmv_buf;
01319 
01320                         lmv_buf.lb_buf = info->mti_xattr_buf;
01321                         lmv_buf.lb_len = sizeof(info->mti_xattr_buf);
01322                         rc = mo_xattr_get(info->mti_env,
01323                                           mdt_object_child(parent),
01324                                           &lmv_buf, XATTR_NAME_LMV);
01325                         if (rc > 0) {
01326                                 struct lmv_mds_md_v1 *lmv;
01327 
01328                                 lmv = lmv_buf.lb_buf;
01329                                 if (le32_to_cpu(lmv->lmv_hash_type) &
01330                                                 LMV_HASH_FLAG_MIGRATION) {
01331                                         /* Get the new parent FID and retry */
01332                                         mdt_object_unlock_put(info, parent,
01333                                                               lh, 1);
01334                                         mdt_lock_handle_init(lh);
01335                                         fid_le_to_cpu(
01336                                                 (struct lu_fid *)rr->rr_fid1,
01337                                                 &lmv->lmv_stripe_fids[1]);
01338                                         goto again;
01339                                 }
01340                         }
01341                 }
01342 
01343                 mdt_set_disposition(info, ldlm_rep, DISP_LOOKUP_NEG);
01344                 if (result == -ESTALE) {
01345                         /*
01346                          * -ESTALE means the parent is a dead(unlinked) dir, so
01347                          * it should return -ENOENT to in accordance with the
01348                          * original mds implementaion.
01349                          */
01350                         GOTO(out_parent, result = -ENOENT);
01351                 }
01352 
01353                 if (!(create_flags & MDS_OPEN_CREAT))
01354                         GOTO(out_parent, result);
01355                 if (exp_connect_flags(req->rq_export) & OBD_CONNECT_RDONLY)
01356                         GOTO(out_parent, result = -EROFS);
01357                 *child_fid = *info->mti_rr.rr_fid2;
01358                 LASSERTF(fid_is_sane(child_fid), "fid="DFID"\n",
01359                          PFID(child_fid));
01360                 /* In the function below, .hs_keycmp resolves to
01361                  * lu_obj_hop_keycmp() */
01362                 /* coverity[overrun-buffer-val] */
01363                 child = mdt_object_new(info->mti_env, mdt, child_fid);
01364         } else {
01365                 /*
01366                  * Check for O_EXCL is moved to the mdt_finish_open(), we need to
01367                  * return FID back in that case.
01368                  */
01369                 mdt_set_disposition(info, ldlm_rep, DISP_LOOKUP_POS);
01370                 child = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, mdt, child_fid);
01371         }
01372         if (IS_ERR(child))
01373                 GOTO(out_parent, result = PTR_ERR(child));
01374 
01376         rc = mdt_version_get_check(info, child, 1);
01377         if (rc)
01378                 GOTO(out_child, result = rc);
01379 
01380         if (result == -ENOENT) {
01381                 /* Create under OBF and .lustre is not permitted */
01382                 if (!fid_is_md_operative(rr->rr_fid1))
01383                         GOTO(out_child, result = -EPERM);
01384 
01385                 /* save versions in reply */
01386                 mdt_version_get_save(info, parent, 0);
01387                 mdt_version_get_save(info, child, 1);
01388 
01389                 /* version of child will be changed */
01390                 tgt_vbr_obj_set(info->mti_env, mdt_obj2dt(child));
01391 
01392                 /* Not found and with MDS_OPEN_CREAT: let's create it. */
01393                 mdt_set_disposition(info, ldlm_rep, DISP_OPEN_CREATE);
01394 
01395                 /* Let lower layers know what is lock mode on directory. */
01396                 info->mti_spec.sp_cr_mode =
01397                         mdt_dlm_mode2mdl_mode(lh->mlh_pdo_mode);
01398 
01399                 /*
01400                  * Do not perform lookup sanity check. We know that name does
01401                  * not exist.
01402                  */
01403                 info->mti_spec.sp_cr_lookup = 0;
01404                 info->mti_spec.sp_feat = &dt_directory_features;
01405 
01406                 result = mdo_create(info->mti_env,
01407                                     mdt_object_child(parent),
01408                                     &rr->rr_name,
01409                                     mdt_object_child(child),
01410                                     &info->mti_spec,
01411                                     &info->mti_attr);
01412                 if (result == -ERESTART) {
01413                         mdt_clear_disposition(info, ldlm_rep, DISP_OPEN_CREATE);
01414                         GOTO(out_child, result);
01415                 } else {
01416                         mdt_prep_ma_buf_from_rep(info, child, ma);
01417                         /* XXX: we should call this once, see few lines below */
01418                         if (result == 0)
01419                                 result = mdt_attr_get_complex(info, child, ma);
01420 
01421                         if (result != 0)
01422                                 GOTO(out_child, result);
01423                 }
01424                 created = 1;
01425         } else {
01426                 /*
01427                  * The object is on remote node, return its FID for remote open.
01428                  */
01429                 if (mdt_object_remote(child)) {
01430                         /*
01431                          * Check if this lock already was sent to client and
01432                          * this is resent case. For resent case do not take lock
01433                          * again, use what is already granted.
01434                          */
01435                         LASSERT(lhc != NULL);
01436 
01437                         rc = mdt_check_resent_lock(info, child, lhc);
01438                         if (rc < 0) {
01439                                 GOTO(out_child, result = rc);
01440                         } else if (rc > 0) {
01441                                 mdt_lock_handle_init(lhc);
01442                                 mdt_lock_reg_init(lhc, LCK_PR);
01443 
01444                                 rc = mdt_object_lock(info, child, lhc,
01445                                                      MDS_INODELOCK_LOOKUP);
01446                         }
01447                         repbody->mbo_fid1 = *mdt_object_fid(child);
01448                         repbody->mbo_valid |= (OBD_MD_FLID | OBD_MD_MDS);
01449                         if (rc != 0)
01450                                 result = rc;
01451                         else
01452                                 result = -MDT_EREMOTE_OPEN;
01453                         GOTO(out_child, result);
01454                 } else if (mdt_object_exists(child)) {
01455                         /* We have to get attr & LOV EA & HSM for this
01456                          * object. */
01457                         mdt_prep_ma_buf_from_rep(info, child, ma);
01458                         ma->ma_need |= MA_HSM;
01459                         result = mdt_attr_get_complex(info, child, ma);
01460                         if (result != 0)
01461                                 GOTO(out_child, result);
01462                 } else {
01463                         /* Object does not exist. Likely FS corruption. */
01464                         CERROR("%s: name '"DNAME"' present, but FID "
01465                                DFID" is invalid\n", mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
01466                                PNAME(&rr->rr_name), PFID(child_fid));
01467                         GOTO(out_child, result = -EIO);
01468                 }
01469         }
01470 
01471         rc = mdt_check_resent_lock(info, child, lhc);
01472         if (rc < 0) {
01473                 GOTO(out_child, result = rc);
01474         } else if (rc == 0) {
01475                 /* the open lock might already be gotten in
01476                  * ldlm_handle_enqueue() */
01477                 LASSERT(lustre_msg_get_flags(req->rq_reqmsg) & MSG_RESENT);
01478                 if (create_flags & MDS_OPEN_LOCK)
01479                         mdt_set_disposition(info, ldlm_rep, DISP_OPEN_LOCK);
01480         } else {
01481                 /* get openlock if this isn't replay and client requested it */
01482                 if (!req_is_replay(req)) {
01483                         rc = mdt_object_open_lock(info, child, lhc, &ibits);
01484                         object_locked = 1;
01485                         if (rc != 0)
01486                                 GOTO(out_child_unlock, result = rc);
01487                         else if (create_flags & MDS_OPEN_LOCK)
01488                                 mdt_set_disposition(info, ldlm_rep,
01489                                                     DISP_OPEN_LOCK);
01490                 }
01491         }
01492         /* Try to open it now. */
01493         rc = mdt_finish_open(info, parent, child, create_flags,
01494                              created, ldlm_rep);
01495         if (rc) {
01496                 result = rc;
01497                 /* openlock will be released if mdt_finish_open failed */
01498                 mdt_clear_disposition(info, ldlm_rep, DISP_OPEN_LOCK);
01499 
01500                 if (created && create_flags & MDS_OPEN_VOLATILE) {
01501                         CERROR("%s: cannot open volatile file "DFID", orphan "
01502                                "file will be left in PENDING directory until "
01503                                "next reboot, rc = %d\n", mdt_obd_name(mdt),
01504                                PFID(mdt_object_fid(child)), rc);
01505                         GOTO(out_child_unlock, result);
01506                 }
01507 
01508                 if (created) {
01509                         ma->ma_need = 0;
01510                         ma->ma_valid = 0;
01511                         rc = mdo_unlink(info->mti_env,
01512                                         mdt_object_child(parent),
01513                                         mdt_object_child(child),
01514                                         &rr->rr_name,
01515                                         &info->mti_attr, 0);
01516                         if (rc != 0)
01517                                 CERROR("%s: "DFID" cleanup of open: rc = %d\n",
01518                                        mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
01519                                        PFID(mdt_object_fid(child)), rc);
01520                         mdt_clear_disposition(info, ldlm_rep, DISP_OPEN_CREATE);
01521                 }
01522         }
01523         EXIT;
01524 out_child_unlock:
01525         if (object_locked)
01526                 mdt_object_open_unlock(info, child, lhc, ibits, result);
01527 out_child:
01528         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, child);
01529 out_parent:
01530         mdt_object_unlock_put(info, parent, lh, result || !created);
01531 out:
01532         if (result)
01533                 lustre_msg_set_transno(req->rq_repmsg, 0);
01534         return result;
01535 }
01536 
01540 static struct mdt_object *mdt_orphan_open(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
01541                                           struct mdt_device *mdt,
01542                                           const struct lu_fid *fid,
01543                                           struct md_attr *attr, fmode_t fmode)
01544 {
01545         const struct lu_env *env = info->mti_env;
01546         struct md_op_spec *spec = &info->mti_spec;
01547         struct lu_fid *local_root_fid = &info->mti_tmp_fid1;
01548         struct mdt_object *obj = NULL;
01549         struct mdt_object *local_root;
01550         static const struct lu_name lname = {
01551                 .ln_name = "i_am_nobody",
01552                 .ln_namelen = sizeof("i_am_nobody") - 1,
01553         };
01554         struct lu_ucred *uc;
01555         cfs_cap_t uc_cap_save;
01556         int rc;
01557         ENTRY;
01558 
01559         rc = dt_root_get(env, mdt->mdt_bottom, local_root_fid);
01560         if (rc != 0)
01561                 RETURN(ERR_PTR(rc));
01562 
01563         local_root = mdt_object_find(env, mdt, local_root_fid);
01564         if (IS_ERR(local_root))
01565                 RETURN(local_root);
01566 
01567         obj = mdt_object_new(env, mdt, fid);
01568         if (IS_ERR(obj))
01569                 GOTO(out, rc = PTR_ERR(obj));
01570 
01571         spec->sp_cr_lookup = 0;
01572         spec->sp_feat = &dt_directory_features;
01573         spec->sp_cr_mode = MDL_MINMODE; /* no lock */
01574         spec->sp_cr_flags = MDS_OPEN_VOLATILE | fmode;
01575         if (attr->ma_valid & MA_LOV) {
01576                 spec->u.sp_ea.eadata = attr->ma_lmm;
01577                 spec->u.sp_ea.eadatalen = attr->ma_lmm_size;
01578                 spec->sp_cr_flags |= MDS_OPEN_HAS_EA;
01579         } else {
01580                 spec->sp_cr_flags |= MDS_OPEN_DELAY_CREATE;
01581         }
01582 
01583         uc = lu_ucred(env);
01584         uc_cap_save = uc->uc_cap;
01585         uc->uc_cap |= 1 << CFS_CAP_DAC_OVERRIDE;
01586         rc = mdo_create(env, mdt_object_child(local_root), &lname,
01587                         mdt_object_child(obj), spec, attr);
01588         uc->uc_cap = uc_cap_save;
01589         if (rc < 0) {
01590                 CERROR("%s: cannot create volatile file "DFID": rc = %d\n",
01591                        mdt_obd_name(mdt), PFID(fid), rc);
01592                 GOTO(out, rc);
01593         }
01594 
01595         rc = mo_open(env, mdt_object_child(obj), MDS_OPEN_CREATED);
01596         if (rc < 0)
01597                 CERROR("%s: cannot open volatile file "DFID", orphan "
01598                        "file will be left in PENDING directory until "
01599                        "next reboot, rc = %d\n", mdt_obd_name(mdt),
01600                        PFID(fid), rc);
01601         GOTO(out, rc);
01602 
01603 out:
01604         if (rc < 0) {
01605                 if (!IS_ERR(obj))
01606                         mdt_object_put(env, obj);
01607                 obj = ERR_PTR(rc);
01608         }
01609         mdt_object_put(env, local_root);
01610         return obj;
01611 }
01612 
01613 static int mdt_hsm_release(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct mdt_object *o,
01614                            struct md_attr *ma)
01615 {
01616         struct mdt_lock_handle *lh = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_LAYOUT];
01617         struct close_data      *data;
01618         struct ldlm_lock       *lease;
01619         struct mdt_object      *orphan;
01620         struct md_attr         *orp_ma;
01621         struct lu_buf          *buf;
01622         bool                    lease_broken;
01623         int                     rc;
01624         int                     rc2;
01625         ENTRY;
01626 
01627         if (exp_connect_flags(info->mti_exp) & OBD_CONNECT_RDONLY)
01628                 RETURN(-EROFS);
01629 
01630         data = req_capsule_client_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_CLOSE_DATA);
01631         if (data == NULL)
01632                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
01633 
01634         lease = ldlm_handle2lock(&data->cd_handle);
01635         if (lease == NULL)
01636                 RETURN(-ESTALE);
01637 
01638         /* try to hold open_sem so that nobody else can open the file */
01639         if (!down_write_trylock(&o->mot_open_sem)) {
01640                 ldlm_lock_cancel(lease);
01641                 GOTO(out_reprocess, rc = -EBUSY);
01642         }
01643 
01644         /* Check if the lease open lease has already canceled */
01645         lock_res_and_lock(lease);
01646         lease_broken = ldlm_is_cancel(lease);
01647         unlock_res_and_lock(lease);
01648 
01649         LDLM_DEBUG(lease, DFID " lease broken? %d",
01650                    PFID(mdt_object_fid(o)), lease_broken);
01651 
01652         /* Cancel server side lease. Client side counterpart should
01653          * have been cancelled. It's okay to cancel it now as we've
01654          * held mot_open_sem. */
01655         ldlm_lock_cancel(lease);
01656 
01657         if (lease_broken) /* don't perform release task */
01658                 GOTO(out_unlock, rc = -ESTALE);
01659 
01660         if (fid_is_zero(&data->cd_fid) || !fid_is_sane(&data->cd_fid))
01661                 GOTO(out_unlock, rc = -EINVAL);
01662 
01663         /* ma_need was set before but it seems fine to change it in order to
01664          * avoid modifying the one from RPC */
01665         ma->ma_need = MA_HSM;
01666         rc = mdt_attr_get_complex(info, o, ma);
01667         if (rc != 0)
01668                 GOTO(out_unlock, rc);
01669 
01670         if (!mdt_hsm_release_allow(ma))
01671                 GOTO(out_unlock, rc = -EPERM);
01672 
01673         /* already released? */
01674         if (ma->ma_hsm.mh_flags & HS_RELEASED)
01675                 GOTO(out_unlock, rc = 0);
01676 
01677         /* Compare on-disk and packed data_version */
01678         if (data->cd_data_version != ma->ma_hsm.mh_arch_ver) {
01679                 CDEBUG(D_HSM, DFID" data_version mismatches: packed="LPU64
01680                        " and on-disk="LPU64"\n", PFID(mdt_object_fid(o)),
01681                        data->cd_data_version, ma->ma_hsm.mh_arch_ver);
01682                 GOTO(out_unlock, rc = -EPERM);
01683         }
01684 
01685         ma->ma_valid = MA_INODE;
01686         ma->ma_attr.la_valid &= LA_ATIME | LA_MTIME | LA_CTIME | LA_SIZE;
01687         rc = mo_attr_set(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(o), ma);
01688         if (rc < 0)
01689                 GOTO(out_unlock, rc);
01690 
01691         ma->ma_need = MA_INODE | MA_LOV;
01692         rc = mdt_attr_get_complex(info, o, ma);
01693         if (rc < 0)
01694                 GOTO(out_unlock, rc);
01695 
01696         if (!(ma->ma_valid & MA_LOV)) {
01697                 /* Even empty file are released */
01698                 memset(ma->ma_lmm, 0, sizeof(*ma->ma_lmm));
01699                 ma->ma_lmm->lmm_magic = cpu_to_le32(LOV_MAGIC_V1_DEF);
01700                 ma->ma_lmm->lmm_pattern = cpu_to_le32(LOV_PATTERN_RAID0);
01701                 ma->ma_lmm->lmm_stripe_size = cpu_to_le32(LOV_MIN_STRIPE_SIZE);
01702                 ma->ma_lmm_size = sizeof(*ma->ma_lmm);
01703         } else {
01704                 /* Magic must be LOV_MAGIC_Vx_DEF otherwise LOD will interpret
01705                  * ma_lmm as lov_user_md, then it will be confused by union of
01706                  * layout_gen and stripe_offset. */
01707                 if (le32_to_cpu(ma->ma_lmm->lmm_magic) == LOV_MAGIC_V1)
01708                         ma->ma_lmm->lmm_magic = cpu_to_le32(LOV_MAGIC_V1_DEF);
01709                 else if (le32_to_cpu(ma->ma_lmm->lmm_magic) == LOV_MAGIC_V3)
01710                         ma->ma_lmm->lmm_magic = cpu_to_le32(LOV_MAGIC_V3_DEF);
01711                 else
01712                         GOTO(out_unlock, rc = -EINVAL);
01713         }
01714 
01715         /* Set file as released */
01716         ma->ma_lmm->lmm_pattern |= cpu_to_le32(LOV_PATTERN_F_RELEASED);
01717 
01718         orp_ma = &info->mti_u.hsm.attr;
01719         orp_ma->ma_attr.la_mode = S_IFREG | S_IWUSR;
01720         orp_ma->ma_attr.la_uid = ma->ma_attr.la_uid;
01721         orp_ma->ma_attr.la_gid = ma->ma_attr.la_gid;
01722         orp_ma->ma_attr.la_valid = LA_MODE | LA_UID | LA_GID;
01723         orp_ma->ma_lmm = ma->ma_lmm;
01724         orp_ma->ma_lmm_size = ma->ma_lmm_size;
01725         orp_ma->ma_valid = MA_INODE | MA_LOV;
01726         orphan = mdt_orphan_open(info, info->mti_mdt, &data->cd_fid, orp_ma,
01727                                  FMODE_WRITE);
01728         if (IS_ERR(orphan)) {
01729                 CERROR("%s: cannot open orphan file "DFID": rc = %ld\n",
01730                        mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt), PFID(&data->cd_fid),
01731                        PTR_ERR(orphan));
01732                 GOTO(out_unlock, rc = PTR_ERR(orphan));
01733         }
01734 
01735         /* Set up HSM attribute for orphan object */
01736         CLASSERT(sizeof(struct hsm_attrs) <= sizeof(info->mti_xattr_buf));
01737         buf = &info->mti_buf;
01738         buf->lb_buf = info->mti_xattr_buf;
01739         buf->lb_len = sizeof(struct hsm_attrs);
01740         ma->ma_hsm.mh_flags |= HS_RELEASED;
01741         lustre_hsm2buf(buf->lb_buf, &ma->ma_hsm);
01742         ma->ma_hsm.mh_flags &= ~HS_RELEASED;
01743 
01744         mdt_lock_reg_init(lh, LCK_EX);
01745         rc = mdt_object_lock(info, o, lh, MDS_INODELOCK_LAYOUT |
01746                              MDS_INODELOCK_XATTR);
01747         if (rc != 0)
01748                 GOTO(out_close, rc);
01749 
01750         rc = mo_xattr_set(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(orphan), buf,
01751                           XATTR_NAME_HSM, 0);
01752 
01753         if (rc == 0)
01754                 /* Swap layout with orphan object */
01755                 rc = mo_swap_layouts(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(o),
01756                                      mdt_object_child(orphan),
01757                                      SWAP_LAYOUTS_MDS_HSM);
01758 
01759         /* Release exclusive LL */
01760         mdt_object_unlock(info, o, lh, 1);
01761 
01762         EXIT;
01763 
01764 out_close:
01765         /* Close orphan object anyway */
