01766         rc2 = mo_close(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(orphan), orp_ma,
01767                        FMODE_WRITE);
01768         if (rc2 < 0)
01769                 CERROR("%s: error closing volatile file "DFID": rc = %d\n",
01770                        mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt), PFID(&data->cd_fid), rc2);
01771         LU_OBJECT_DEBUG(D_HSM, info->mti_env, &orphan->mot_obj,
01772                         "object closed");
01773         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, orphan);
01774 
01775 out_unlock:
01776         up_write(&o->mot_open_sem);
01777 
01778         /* already released */
01779         if (rc == 0) {
01780                 struct mdt_body *repbody;
01781 
01782                 repbody = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
01783                 LASSERT(repbody != NULL);
01784                 repbody->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_CLOSE_INTENT_EXECED;
01785         }
01786 
01787 out_reprocess:
01788         ldlm_reprocess_all(lease->l_resource);
01789         LDLM_LOCK_PUT(lease);
01790 
01791         ma->ma_valid = 0;
01792         ma->ma_need = 0;
01793 
01794         return rc;
01795 }
01796 
01797 int mdt_close_swap_layouts(struct mdt_thread_info *info,
01798                            struct mdt_object *o, struct md_attr *ma)
01799 {
01800         struct mdt_lock_handle  *lh1 = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_NEW];
01801         struct mdt_lock_handle  *lh2 = &info->mti_lh[MDT_LH_OLD];
01802         struct close_data       *data;
01803         struct ldlm_lock        *lease;
01804         struct mdt_object       *o1 = o, *o2;
01805         bool                     lease_broken;
01806         bool                     swap_objects;
01807         int                      rc;
01808         ENTRY;
01809 
01810         if (exp_connect_flags(info->mti_exp) & OBD_CONNECT_RDONLY)
01811                 RETURN(-EROFS);
01812 
01813         if (!S_ISREG(lu_object_attr(&o1->mot_obj)))
01814                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
01815 
01816         data = req_capsule_client_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_CLOSE_DATA);
01817         if (data == NULL)
01818                 RETURN(-EPROTO);
01819 
01820         if (fid_is_zero(&data->cd_fid) || !fid_is_sane(&data->cd_fid))
01821                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
01822 
01823         rc = lu_fid_cmp(&data->cd_fid, mdt_object_fid(o));
01824         if (unlikely(rc == 0))
01825                 RETURN(-EINVAL);
01826 
01827         /* Exchange o1 and o2, to enforce locking order */
01828         swap_objects = (rc < 0);
01829 
01830         lease = ldlm_handle2lock(&data->cd_handle);
01831         if (lease == NULL)
01832                 RETURN(-ESTALE);
01833 
01834         o2 = mdt_object_find(info->mti_env, info->mti_mdt, &data->cd_fid);
01835         if (IS_ERR(o2))
01836                 GOTO(out_lease, rc = PTR_ERR(o2));
01837 
01838         if (!S_ISREG(lu_object_attr(&o2->mot_obj))) {
01839                 swap_objects = false; /* not swapped yet */
01840                 GOTO(out_obj, rc = -EINVAL);
01841         }
01842 
01843         if (swap_objects)
01844                 swap(o1, o2);
01845 
01846         rc = mo_permission(info->mti_env, NULL, mdt_object_child(o1), NULL,
01847                            MAY_WRITE);
01848         if (rc < 0)
01849                 GOTO(out_obj, rc);
01850 
01851         rc = mo_permission(info->mti_env, NULL, mdt_object_child(o2), NULL,
01852                            MAY_WRITE);
01853         if (rc < 0)
01854                 GOTO(out_obj, rc);
01855 
01856         /* try to hold open_sem so that nobody else can open the file */
01857         if (!down_write_trylock(&o->mot_open_sem)) {
01858                 ldlm_lock_cancel(lease);
01859                 GOTO(out_obj, rc = -EBUSY);
01860         }
01861 
01862         /* Check if the lease open lease has already canceled */
01863         lock_res_and_lock(lease);
01864         lease_broken = ldlm_is_cancel(lease);
01865         unlock_res_and_lock(lease);
01866 
01867         LDLM_DEBUG(lease, DFID " lease broken? %d",
01868                    PFID(mdt_object_fid(o)), lease_broken);
01869 
01870         /* Cancel server side lease. Client side counterpart should
01871          * have been cancelled. It's okay to cancel it now as we've
01872          * held mot_open_sem. */
01873         ldlm_lock_cancel(lease);
01874 
01875         if (lease_broken)
01876                 GOTO(out_unlock_sem, rc = -ESTALE);
01877 
01878         mdt_lock_reg_init(lh1, LCK_EX);
01879         rc = mdt_object_lock(info, o1, lh1, MDS_INODELOCK_LAYOUT |
01880                              MDS_INODELOCK_XATTR);
01881         if (rc < 0)
01882                 GOTO(out_unlock_sem, rc);
01883 
01884         mdt_lock_reg_init(lh2, LCK_EX);
01885         rc = mdt_object_lock(info, o2, lh2, MDS_INODELOCK_LAYOUT |
01886                              MDS_INODELOCK_XATTR);
01887         if (rc < 0)
01888                 GOTO(out_unlock1, rc);
01889 
01890         /* Swap layout with orphan object */
01891         rc = mo_swap_layouts(info->mti_env, mdt_object_child(o1),
01892                              mdt_object_child(o2), 0);
01893         if (rc < 0)
01894                 GOTO(out_unlock2, rc);
01895 
01896         EXIT;
01897 
01898 out_unlock2:
01899         /* Release exclusive LL */
01900         mdt_object_unlock(info, o2, lh2, 1);
01901 
01902 out_unlock1:
01903         mdt_object_unlock(info, o1, lh1, 1);
01904 
01905 out_unlock_sem:
01906         up_write(&o->mot_open_sem);
01907 
01908         /* already swapped */
01909         if (rc == 0) {
01910                 struct mdt_body *repbody;
01911 
01912                 repbody = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill, &RMF_MDT_BODY);
01913                 LASSERT(repbody != NULL);
01914                 repbody->mbo_valid |= OBD_MD_CLOSE_INTENT_EXECED;
01915         }
01916 
01917 out_obj:
01918         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, swap_objects ? o1 : o2);
01919 
01920         ldlm_reprocess_all(lease->l_resource);
01921 
01922 out_lease:
01923         LDLM_LOCK_PUT(lease);
01924 
01925         if (ma != NULL) {
01926                 ma->ma_valid = 0;
01927                 ma->ma_need = 0;
01928         }
01929 
01930         return rc;
01931 }
01932 
01933 #define MFD_CLOSED(mode) ((mode) == MDS_FMODE_CLOSED)
01934 static int mdt_mfd_closed(struct mdt_file_data *mfd)
01935 {
01936         return ((mfd == NULL) || MFD_CLOSED(mfd->mfd_mode));
01937 }
01938 
01939 int mdt_mfd_close(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct mdt_file_data *mfd)
01940 {
01941         struct mdt_object *o = mfd->mfd_object;
01942         struct md_object *next = mdt_object_child(o);
01943         struct md_attr *ma = &info->mti_attr;
01944         int rc = 0;
01945         __u64 mode;
01946         ENTRY;
01947 
01948         mode = mfd->mfd_mode;
01949 
01950         if (ma->ma_attr_flags & MDS_HSM_RELEASE) {
01951                 rc = mdt_hsm_release(info, o, ma);
01952                 if (rc < 0) {
01953                         CDEBUG(D_HSM, "%s: File " DFID " release failed: %d\n",
01954                                mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
01955                                PFID(mdt_object_fid(o)), rc);
01956                         /* continue to close even error occurred. */
01957                 }
01958         }
01959 
01960         if (ma->ma_attr_flags & MDS_CLOSE_LAYOUT_SWAP) {
01961                 rc = mdt_close_swap_layouts(info, o, ma);
01962                 if (rc < 0) {
01963                         CDEBUG(D_INODE,
01964                                "%s: cannot swap layout of "DFID": rc=%d\n",
01965                                mdt_obd_name(info->mti_mdt),
01966                                PFID(mdt_object_fid(o)), rc);
01967                         /* continue to close even if error occurred. */
01968                 }
01969         }
01970 
01971         if (mode & FMODE_WRITE)
01972                 mdt_write_put(o);
01973         else if (mode & MDS_FMODE_EXEC)
01974                 mdt_write_allow(o);
01975 
01976         /* Update atime on close only. */
01977         if ((mode & MDS_FMODE_EXEC || mode & FMODE_READ || mode & FMODE_WRITE)
01978             && (ma->ma_valid & MA_INODE) && (ma->ma_attr.la_valid & LA_ATIME)) {
01979                 /* Set the atime only. */
01980                 ma->ma_valid = MA_INODE;
01981                 ma->ma_attr.la_valid = LA_ATIME;
01982                 rc = mo_attr_set(info->mti_env, next, ma);
01983         }
01984 
01985         /* If file data is modified, add the dirty flag. */
01986         if (ma->ma_attr_flags & MDS_DATA_MODIFIED)
01987                 rc = mdt_add_dirty_flag(info, o, ma);
01988 
01989         ma->ma_need |= MA_INODE;
01990         ma->ma_valid &= ~MA_INODE;
01991 
01992         if (!MFD_CLOSED(mode))
01993                 rc = mo_close(info->mti_env, next, ma, mode);
01994 
01995         /* adjust open and lease count */
01996         if (mode & MDS_OPEN_LEASE) {
01997                 LASSERT(atomic_read(&o->mot_lease_count) > 0);
01998                 atomic_dec(&o->mot_lease_count);
01999         }
02000 
02001         LASSERT(atomic_read(&o->mot_open_count) > 0);
02002         atomic_dec(&o->mot_open_count);
02003         mdt_mfd_free(mfd);
02004         mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, o);
02005 
02006         RETURN(rc);
02007 }
02008 
02009 int mdt_close_internal(struct mdt_thread_info *info, struct ptlrpc_request *req,
02010                        struct mdt_body *repbody)
02011 {
02012         struct mdt_export_data *med;
02013         struct mdt_file_data   *mfd;
02014         struct mdt_object      *o;
02015         struct md_attr         *ma = &info->mti_attr;
02016         int                     ret = 0;
02017         int                     rc = 0;
02018         ENTRY;
02019 
02020         med = &req->rq_export->exp_mdt_data;
02021         spin_lock(&med->med_open_lock);
02022         mfd = mdt_handle2mfd(med, &info->mti_close_handle, req_is_replay(req));
02023         if (mdt_mfd_closed(mfd)) {
02024                 spin_unlock(&med->med_open_lock);
02025                 CDEBUG(D_INODE, "no handle for file close: fid = "DFID
02026                        ": cookie = "LPX64"\n", PFID(info->mti_rr.rr_fid1),
02027                        info->mti_close_handle.cookie);
02029                 rc = -ESTALE;
02030         } else {
02031                 class_handle_unhash(&mfd->mfd_handle);
02032                 list_del_init(&mfd->mfd_list);
02033                 spin_unlock(&med->med_open_lock);
02034 
02035                 /* Do not lose object before last unlink. */
02036                 o = mfd->mfd_object;
02037                 mdt_object_get(info->mti_env, o);
02038                 ret = mdt_mfd_close(info, mfd);
02039                 if (repbody != NULL)
02040                         rc = mdt_handle_last_unlink(info, o, ma);
02041                 mdt_object_put(info->mti_env, o);
02042         }
02043 
02044         RETURN(rc ? rc : ret);
02045 }
02046 
02047 int mdt_close(struct tgt_session_info *tsi)
02048 {
02049         struct mdt_thread_info  *info = tsi2mdt_info(tsi);
02050         struct ptlrpc_request   *req = tgt_ses_req(tsi);
02051         struct md_attr         *ma = &info->mti_attr;
02052         struct mdt_body        *repbody = NULL;
02053         int rc, ret = 0;
02054         ENTRY;
02055 
02056         mdt_counter_incr(req, LPROC_MDT_CLOSE);
02057         /* Close may come with the Size-on-MDS update. Unpack it. */
02058         rc = mdt_close_unpack(info);
02059         if (rc)
02060                 GOTO(out, rc = err_serious(rc));
02061 
02062         /* These fields are no longer used and are left for compatibility.
02063          * size is always zero */
02064         req_capsule_set_size(info->mti_pill, &RMF_MDT_MD, RCL_SERVER,
02065                              0);
02066         req_capsule_set_size(info->mti_pill, &RMF_LOGCOOKIES, RCL_SERVER,
02067                              0);
02068         rc = req_capsule_server_pack(info->mti_pill);
02069         if (mdt_check_resent(info, mdt_reconstruct_generic, NULL)) {
02070                 mdt_client_compatibility(info);
02071                 if (rc == 0)
02072                         mdt_fix_reply(info);
02073                 mdt_exit_ucred(info);
02074                 GOTO(out, rc = lustre_msg_get_status(req->rq_repmsg));
02075         }
02076 
02077         /* Continue to close handle even if we can not pack reply */
02078         if (rc == 0) {
02079                 repbody = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill,
02080                                                  &RMF_MDT_BODY);
02081                 ma->ma_lmm = req_capsule_server_get(info->mti_pill,
02082                                                     &RMF_MDT_MD);
02083                 ma->ma_lmm_size = req_capsule_get_size(info->mti_pill,
02084                                                        &RMF_MDT_MD,
02085                                                        RCL_SERVER);
02086                 ma->ma_need = MA_INODE | MA_LOV;
02087                 repbody->mbo_eadatasize = 0;
02088                 repbody->mbo_aclsize = 0;
02089         } else {
02090                 rc = err_serious(rc);
02091         }
02092 
02093         rc = mdt_close_internal(info, req, repbody);
02094         if (rc != -ESTALE)
02095                 mdt_empty_transno(info, rc);
02096 
02097         if (repbody != NULL) {
02098                 mdt_client_compatibility(info);
02099                 rc = mdt_fix_reply(info);
02100         }
02101 
02102         mdt_exit_ucred(info);
02103         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK(OBD_FAIL_MDS_CLOSE_PACK))
02104                 GOTO(out, rc = err_serious(-ENOMEM));
02105 
02106         if (OBD_FAIL_CHECK_RESET(OBD_FAIL_MDS_CLOSE_NET_REP,
02107                                  OBD_FAIL_MDS_CLOSE_NET_REP))
02108                 tsi->tsi_reply_fail_id = OBD_FAIL_MDS_CLOSE_NET_REP;
02109 out:
02110         mdt_thread_info_fini(info);
02111         RETURN(rc ? rc : ret);
02112 }
